data.title: Great atmosphere and good food
data.text:
Went here in a Wednesday evening and it wasn't too crowded. It was walking distance from the Hilton. 

Had the pulled pork sandwich and it was delicious. The french fries were awesome- cooked and seasoned just right. 

Friend had salmon gyro. It was delicious too. 

Prices were very reasonable. 

Service was ok. 

Great place to hang out with friends. 

Will definitely come back here again.

data.title: Great Beer Joint
data.text:
Backyard Ale House has a lot of different beers.  If you go a lot, you can get a booklet. You complete the booklet with all the beers you've tried and you get a gift certificate.  The more booklets you complete the more you get in the way of free gift certificates.  Another added plus is the food.  You can go for happy hour and get half price on beers and food and you got yourself an excellent meal and good beer.  
They also have an outdoor, closed in, and heated back deck area.  You can go there and have parties if you book in advance.

They also sell specialty beers to go.  You can't beat them.

data.title: Great place
data.text: Conveniently located in downtown Scranton PA, near the University. Great place for socializing. It's also really fast to access Uber and soon Lyft, to ensure getting home and not worry about DUIs or causing accidents from enjoying a night out.

data.title: October Fest
data.text:
Excellent beer and great environment.
Went to backyard for the weekend pass on the Octoberfest. Received a free tshirt, beer kiosks, raffle tickets and a wristband for three days into backyard for the weekend festivities. All that for only $20. Outdoor tent set up for special events and games along with craft beers. Inside was a different environment a little more relaxed. So any different types of beer on tap and bottled that you cannot go wrong. The one bar tender was on top of his game. Serving hands down 5-1 to the rest of the tenders. His enthusiasm alone made for a great environment at the bar. Don't forget the back patio! The bar has it all! Only downfall is the limited bathrooms. We all know women and the line at a bar. Atleast during the event they added a few portojohns out under the tent. Overall, I would return for sure. If you like beer and you are not a college freshman you will love it! They outplay the bar directly next door without a doubt!!!

data.title: Nice place to eat and visit with friends
data.text:
First time stopping in we sat in the front bar area and was greeted immediately with big smiles by the waitress.  Before i get to the review, please also be aware that they also have a covered outside seating area and a "backyard" bar with tv's as well.  I wish we would have spotted that area sooner as it looked very inviting. 

Sitting inside, be sure to look up and appreciate their large beer tapper collection.  Pretty cool really.  

The selection of bottled of beer was impressive.  It would be nearly impossible not to find something you want to try!  (Selection changes frequently and they keep those lists up to date.)  The tap beer selection had a good variety and I opted for a local favorite of Yuengling, which is not something I can get in the Midwest.  

I had "just a burger", and my, was this certainly cooked with love.  The taste and freshness was top notch for a burger.  (I'm pretty finicky when it comes to giving burgers a high review rating!)  The sweet potato fries were as good as any fried food could be.  I think I'll make the trip back their soon just for those fries!  Also included at our table was a beef deli wrap and a few "banjo pig" sandwiches.  All of which were met with smiles and great reviews from their consumers.  Next time I'm in Scranton, this is one place I will certainly return.  Next time i hope to make their weekend brunch time Bloody Mary bar.  Probst!

data.title: Unfriendly staff
data.text: Stopped here for lunch during Family weekend at the University of Scranton. Back patio looked great but there were no seats available.  Pulled pork was very tasty. Chicken burrito was good. Southwest salad was very disappointing. Wait staff was rude and unfriendly and our food took forever to come.  Prices were moderate

data.title: Went in and left
data.text: If looking for a bar this place would probably work. However if looking for dinner skip it. Dark inside. Outdoor space smoky. Went at 6:30 and saw no one eating. Bartender said very little too us. We got a bad vibe and left.

data.title: really has a backyard
data.text: great reasonably priced food...variety of beer choices....very nice wait staff and bartenders...the backyard is complete with heaters and nooks...all in the downtown setting

data.title: Great chili,great service,very friendly staff
data.text: I found this place through Trip Advisor as we were heading home to PA and wanted some great pub food. Well we found it here. The backyard patio was a plus also on a beautiful Sunday. The chili was exceptionally yummy. Always love tasting different chilis. Staff was very attentive.

data.title: great happy hour!
data.text: This place is a great space. In the winter, it has a cozy pub feel. In warmer weather, there's a lovely fenced-in patio that even has its own bar. The happy hour specials are amazing, and they have tasty food to go with their drinks. Great find in downtown Scranton!

data.title: Thursday Dinner
data.text: Easy to find place in downtown Scranton. Great tap beer selection at reasonable prices. We had the middle eastern plate app, chicken burrito, and shrimp wrap. All wre excellent. We went during happy hour, so the apps and beers were half price. Great Deal!. Food was delicious. Service was perfect. Very glan we went.

data.title: Great place for apps and drinks
data.text: We enjoyed stopping in out of the heat for some great appetizers and drinks. The place has a bar atmosphere and the food was very good.

data.title: Stop for dinner
data.text: We stopped for dinner after visiting family in the hospital. Food was good. Service was slow.  Beer selection was nice and varied.

data.title: Great place to eat and drink in Scranton
data.text: Conveniently located walking distance to University of Scranton and the Hilton Hotel.  Great selection of beer and food was delicious.

data.title: A Good Meal
data.text: Visited this restaurant with colleagues while on travel for work based on online reviews and we were not disappointed. It was difficult to find someone to take our order but the food was great and we left feeling more than satisfied.

data.title: Great beer selectio
data.text: Lot of beers on tap.  Tons of bottled beer unbelievable selection.  Food was pretty good.  Boneless buffalo wings unlike any other not all that breading crap, excelkent quality.  Service was very good. Very loud place.

data.title: Awesome and unique eats
data.text: Brought my family and 15 month old and had a great lunch time meal. Staff was friendly, food unique and freshly cooked! Try the Middle Easter Plate for something fresh and unique!

data.title: Fun!
data.text: We chose this for a quick lunch on a road trip. I can't believe how large the beer selection is. Very impressive! The outdoor area was very nice, the food was good and the staff was attentive. I would definitely recommend!

data.title: Great summer night eating & drinking w/friends
data.text:
Been to Backyard a couple of times and always have a great time. Lots of beers...both in bottles and on tap, always friendly helpful service and usually no wait for a table. the menu is limited but not your usual bar fare (ie, NOT a menu full of fried stuff). We had the chips and dip, Cuban sandwich, salmon gyro and the fried baloney sandwich. Something for everyone!! 

If/When you go, I would suggest walking thru the bar and sitting outside. There's are tables, if you want to sit down, and also a bar, if you want to hang-out there.

data.title: Great Night Out
data.text: Relatively good prices, had a great night out with friends! Will definitely go back again for another late night drink!
